fsrtool.name: fsrtool_user
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_user` ( `charID` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `username` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `password` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `vCODE` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `keyID` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `accessMask` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `userIP` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.0.0.0', `description` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `email` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `corpID` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `active` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `timestamp` varchar(14) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `newPass` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `code` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `lang` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'DE', `errorcount` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`charID`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
